UnitDefinition.Name: Job task exposure unit
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted units for job exposure activities.

Unit.Name: µg/cm2/day
Unit.Description: Exposure expressed in micrograms per square centimeter (µg/cm2) per day.

Unit.Name: mg/cm2/day
Unit.Description: Exposure expressed in milligrams per square centimeter (mg/cm2) per day.

Unit.Name: µg/m3
Unit.Description: Exposure expressed in micrograms per cubic meters (µg/m3).

Unit.Name: mg/m3
Unit.Description: Exposure expressed in milligrams per cubic meters (mg/m3).
